Posted By: Blackworm_Bloodworm (10/8/2010 9:57:34 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: The Ravnica dual lands are perfect. It can come into played tapped when you don't need to play creatures or don't want to lose life and can come straight into play with the available mana ready when you need it. It dominates the Tenth Edition painlands because 1. you don't necessarily need to pay life, 2. the most life you will lose is 2, unlike the painlands that require one life every time you use them for colored mana, resulting in an abundance of lost life, and 3. its two basic land types, which can combo well with other cards. The art on this land is gorgeous. It perfectly captures the flavor of Ravnicas sprawling metropolis, and the Selesnyan's sunlight, overgrown sanctuary.
posts.html:
The Ravnica dual lands are perfect. It can come into played tapped when you don't need to play creatures or don't want to lose life and can come straight into play with the available mana ready when you need it. It dominates the Tenth Edition painlands because 1. you don't necessarily need to pay life, 2. the most life you will lose is 2, unlike the painlands that require one life every time you use them for colored mana, resulting in an abundance of lost life, and 3. its two basic land types, which can combo well with other cards. The art on this land is gorgeous. It perfectly captures the flavor of Ravnicas sprawling metropolis, and the Selesnyan's sunlight, overgrown sanctuary.
